text: (Napiye!) Kuruviraka: â€˜â€˜Manitan pucikkakkutiyavarril etuvum tatukkappattu vittataka enakku arivikkappatta vahyil nan kanavillai. Ayinum, cettavai, vatiyakkutiya irattam, panriyin mamicam akiyavai niccayamaka acuttamaka iruppatanal ivaiyum, allah allatavarrin peyar kuruvatu pavamay iruppatanal avvaru kurappattavaiyum (tatai ceyyappattullana.)'' Tavira varampu miri pavam ceyyum nokkaminri evarenum nirppantikkappattu (ivarrai pucittu) vittal, (atu avarkal mitu kurramakatu.) Niccayamaka umatu iraivan mikka mannippavan, mikak karunaiyutaiyavan. (Akave, mannittu vituvan)
